attributes.action: instruct the Department for Health to order pharmacists to destroy medicines which are returned to them ONLY if they are not in a fit state to be dispensed to another patient
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I understand that present policy is that ALL medicines returned to pharmacists are routinely destroyed; even if they were issued by mistake and subsequently returned as a result.  This seems very wasteful; I wonder how many life-saving, or life-enhancing, treatments could be paid for if it were not for this waste.
